featured.text: According to studies, some lullabies provide advice, like the Babylonian lullaby, and quite a few others offer the space to sing the unsung, say the unsayable.

definition.zh_def: 未被讚揚的，未受到重視的
definition.en_def: Not celebrated or praised; not recognized for contributions or achievements.
definition.example: Many unsung heroes worked tirelessly behind the scenes during the crisis.
